item.title: Making a command disable when you are in the wildy?
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

Post any errors!

Note: change the if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) to your wildy co-ords

if (command.startsWith("food")) if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot get food in the wilderness"); } else { addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); }

item.title: Making a command disable when you are in the wildy?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Hi is their a way to make this command:

} if (command.startsWith("food")) { addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); }

not work, when you are in the wildy, so people can’t keep using it, to keep them alive.

Many Thanks
